definition: Treasure Island by R.L. Stevenson 羅伯特·路易斯·斯蒂文森|罗伯特·路易斯·斯蒂文森[Luo2 bo2 te4 · Lu4 yi4 si1 · Si1 di4 wen2 sen1]
gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: Stevenson wrote a book called Treasure Island.
sentences.chinese: 史蒂文森寫了一部名叫《金銀島》的小說。

sentences.english: It was the day before we expected to see Treasure Island.
sentences.chinese: 那天是我們預計到達金銀島的前一天。

sentences.english: Treasure Island deep in the town of thieves O O Bay.
sentences.chinese: 金銀島位於深澳鎮賊澳灣。

sentences.english: The Hispaniola had begun her voyage to Treasure Island.
sentences.chinese: 伊斯帕尼奧拉號向金銀島的航行開始了。

sentences.english: Richard demonstrating how to take silhouette at Treasure Island.
sentences.chinese: 楊軍在金銀島示範拍攝剪影。

sentences.english: The author entitled his book "Treasure Island".
sentences.chinese: 作者將他的書定名爲《金銀島》。

sentences.english: Treasure Island is probably his best-known work.
sentences.chinese: 《金銀島》大概是他最著名的作品。
